message:
For our startup Challengein.com we need to create games around niches topic (StarWars, Lady Gaga, Football, etc). I want to get in touch to admins of forums and blogs about the topic to ask a partnership. But I am simply ignored... 

I've changed message, title, not spammy, more personal, giving them vip access, but always ignored...

What you'll do if you were in my role?
Be on the forum, part of the community... if only for a few weeks, enough to let them know you're one of them. I speak from experience... we look inwards, not outwards.

as @buro9 is saying, your best way to get in touch with these people is to actually know them. Else try to get a reference from somebody that can connect you with them. Unless you do that, even personalizing a message might just seem false and thus fail to get your point across.
everyone seems to have the same idea
Understood. Effectively it can be the only way. I'll try to do it. Thanks
